data.name: File Output
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    {{#if (not_empty fileName)}}
    <setHeader name="CamelFileName">
        <simple>
            {{fileName}}
        </simple>
    </setHeader>
    {{/if}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    <to uri="{{type}}://{{directory}}{{querystring query_params}}{{allowNullBody}}"/>
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
